messages.subject: Re: Doubts - PA
messages.msgSnippet: ... A speech/history co-op we belong to that meets on Monday mornings. The kids range in age from 3 to 11 and have the option of presenting a speech to the
messages.messageBody:
----------
>From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1290
>Date: Tue, Jun 5, 2001, 1:56 AM
>

>>>Brit, when asked by me if she'd like to do a speech on
> the woodland indians
>
> Make a speech to whom??


A speech/history co-op we belong to that meets on Monday mornings. The kids
range in age from 3 to 11 and have the option of presenting a speech to the
group, on or off topic, and then one of the moms puts together an on-topic
craft (Woodland Indians was my week, we did weaving with construction paper)
that anyone who wants to can participate in, and the rest of the 2 hours is
a playdate, basically.

Pam
